author: sebor
msg: * _config.h: Moved each compiler-specific section to its own header.
* _config-acc.h: HP aC++ configuration definitions and overrides.
* _config-eccp.h: Same for the EDG eccp demo.
* _config-sunpro.h: Same for Sun C++ aka SunPro.
* _config-xlc.h: Same for IBM XLC++ aka VisualAge C++.

author: arminw
msg: add new test to show table-per-subclass inheritance bug

author: crossley
msg: html block: Add CleanupTransformer. Enables indent html, add relevant line-breaks,
and remove any namespaces that are not wanted.

author: vsiveton
msg: PR: MJAVADOC-45: Quoted argument text must escape apostrophes
Modified quotedArgument( String value ) method and added a test case
